abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33969504, pmid33956050, pmid33999828, pmid33914045, pmid33950236, pmid34014911, pmid33830171, pmid33861316, pmid34014908, pmid33951374, pmid34043841, pmid33825846, pmid34081332, pmid33978754, pmid33993228, pmid33772772, pmid34003502, pmid33279587, pmid34042956, pmid34081075, pmid34037666, pmid34003804, pmid33992073
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.07.02
